ValidationRule.description: Triggers an error message if hours entered are not in quarter hour format.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( MOD(pse__Monday_Hours__c ,0.25) <> 0 , MOD(pse__Tuesday_Hours__c ,0.25) <> 0 , MOD(pse__Wednesday_Hours__c ,0.25) <> 0 , MOD(pse__Thursday_Hours__c ,0.25) <> 0 , MOD(pse__Friday_Hours__c ,0.25) <> 0 , MOD(pse__Saturday_Hours__c ,0.25) <> 0 , MOD(pse__Sunday_Hours__c ,0.25) <> 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Time must be entered by the quarter hour.
